pr_title: HBASE-25365 The log in move_servers_rsgroup is incorrect

timeline.bodyText: nit: 'server' in the log message is redundant; we are always moving between servers?
timeline.author: saintstack

timeline.bodyText: Why not say, 'All regions from {} moved from {} to {}, movedServerNames, sourceGroupName, targetGroupName?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: The regions in movedServerNames originally belongs to the source group. So it should not say "move from sourceGroupName to targetGroupName". Maybe it can be like this: “All regions from {} are moved back to {}, movedServerNames, sourceGroupName”?
replies.author: ZhaoBQ

replies.bodyText: If that is what is happening, then yes, your rephrasing makes more sense (IMO). Thanks.
replies.author: saintstack

timeline.message: HBASE-25365 The log in move_servers_rsgroup is incorrect
